metadata.notes: Public web sources only. No hallucinated fields. Most large international law firms have very limited public review presence on Czech platforms. Reviews collected from batch1 (first 10 firms) had substantive content; remaining firms had insufficient public reviews.

reviews.review_text: Brilliant & Truly Magnificent. Keep on perfecting corporate law and on excelling as a global corporate law firm which is the best in the world.

Lawyers without ethics. In their presentation they write that they support bigenitioriality instead they played dirty by using lies and slander as a weapon to alienate me from my children. Now the truth has come out but unfortunately, their bad actions have created trauma that my children will carry with them throughout their lives.
Excellent and complex legal services, great people

Pri telefonick� komunikaci se snazi ziskat od vas informace, ktere zneu�ijou a nasledne vse pou�ijou proti vam. Tvari se jak nejlepsi pritel a chteji vam pomoci, ale pravda je jina. Zatajuji zaplacene splatky pred soudama aby ukazali jak jste neschopni a nespolehliv�.
Pochybn� firma zastupuj�c� dal�� pochybn� spole�nosti. Pokud si tedy zakl�d�te na dobr�m jm�nu, vyhnul bych se t�to firm� velk�m obloukem.

Great experience with the approach of Ms. Mgr. Jana Bartoskova. She proposed a very rational and fast solution. She saved me unnecessary costs for legal services and helped during the telephone consultation. I recommend using the services of the Havel&Partners law firm.
reviews.note: Originally in Slovak, translated by Google

reviews.review_text: Unpleasant experience. The lady at the reception was reserved, arrogant and seemed to me to be under the influence of alcohol. You pay for the services and after an hour of conversation the lady asks you, "What do you want from us?"

Unfortunately, I had a very negative experience with this law firm. After paying a large amount, the services were not provided to the appropriate extent and repeated attempts at communication (by e-mail and telephone) were not responded to. Essential documents were processed with delay or not at all. I am currently filing an official complaint with the Czech Bar Association. I expected a professional approach, which unfortunately I did not get.
a huge law firm with experts in all areas of law
They won't help you here.... as a person without a legal education, I would expect an ordinary human approach from the office. Wrong.

We have been cooperating with HP Law Firm for many years on important transactions for our clients. We are always satisfied. We appreciate the professional approach, comprehensive approach of the firm and functional international network. Ing. Vaclav Stryhal, MBA/ VGD Corporate Finance/ Managing Partner

reviews.review_text: We signed a purchase contract for an apartment with Mrs. JUDr. Radka Rutar. Unprofessional behavior.
reviews.note: Translated by Google from Czech, review text truncated - full review was longer

reviews.review_text: Unfortunately, I have to agree with the negative reviews listed here. If you are looking for a law firm that instead of seeking a fair solution relies on pre-litigation threats and mass mailings of automated letters, you have come to the right place.
reviews.note: Translated by Google from Czech, review text truncated

reviews.review_text: Anyone who advocates for PicRights and similar companies doesn't even deserve 1 star.
reviews.note: Translated by Google from Czech, edited review

reviews.review_text: Before the lawsuit at 39,90.. ?? I call this the absolute bottom.
Calling someone is a miracle. When that happens, they say they'll call back and then nothing. Anyone who doesn't have millions or doesn't care about them is just out of luck.
Only titled enforcers have the decency to respond to emails.
Complete satisfaction. What we agreed on, that's what happened. They investigate, respond, advise. Services as I imagine.
Execution at all costs - mainly to make money.
.... No need for words

known_limitations: Many large international law firms (Big Law) have limited public reviews in Czech Republic
Google Maps reviews for B2B services are sparse compared to consumer businesses
Firmy.cz often has no reviews for professional services firms
Facebook pages for law firms typically have 0 public reviews
Some negative reviews relate to debt collection activities, not legal advisory services
CityMart.cz reviews lack dates and star ratings
Some firms (havel-legal) appear to be duplicates of others (HAVEL & PARTNERS)
